articles.author: Ian Carlos Campbell
articles.title: Peak Design claims Amazon copied its Everyday Sling bag - The Verge
articles.description: Accessory maker Peak Design thinks Amazon copied its Everyday Sling bag, and the company made a video imagining how it happened. The bags share a name and several features, and Peak Design believes Amazon has infringed on its intellectual property.
articles.content:
The differences between the two bags are bigger than the price
